Creativity + Humanity + Technology

The creative minds that are conceiving the networks most highly awarded and effective work aren’t solely writer and art director creative teams. Technologists are at the heart of our work as the communication format, audience and creators have changed.

DDB Launchpad becomes POD.

Launchpad is a 3-month internship program that runs across fourteen offices of the DDB global network.

POD is part lab,
part internship program.

Starting in Sydney and spanning the DDB international network, this evolution sees the program expand from the original formula of a creative team to now include young technology thinkers.
